paper.title: Communication in bounded depth circuits

author.org: Matematický ústav AVČR, Praha 1, Czech Republic

paper.publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
paper.abstract: We show that rigidity of matrices can be used to prove lower bounds on depth 2 circuits and communication graphs. We prove a general nonlinear bound on a certain type of circuits and thus, in particular, we determine the asymptotic size of depthd superconcentrators for all depths ≥4 (for even depths ≥4 it has been determined before).
